title.rendered: ZKTECO C3-100 PoE CASE B IP-BASED DOOR ACCESS CONTROL PANEL

content.rendered:
C3-100 is a One Door Two-Way Card Access Control Panel

Features

  • User – 30,000
  • Event Buffer – 100,000 transactions
  • Communication – TCP/IP, RS-485 and WiFi optional
  • Number of doors controlled – One door
  • Number of readers Supported – 2
  • Types of readers supported – 26-bit Wiegand, others upon request
  • Number of Inputs – 2 (Exit Device and Door Status), 2 (1-From C Relay for Lock and 1-
  • Number of Outputs – 2 (One Form C relay for lock and one Form C relay for Aux output)
